import React,{Component} from 'react' import Add from './addnew' import Book from './shelfbook' const Shelves=(props)=>{ const {books}=this.props return(

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {books.filter(books=>books.shelf=== "currentlyReading") .map(book=>{ return(
    2. )}) }

Want to Read

    {books.filter(books=>books.shelf==="wantToRead") .map(book=>{ return(
    2. )}) }

Read

    {books.filter(books=>books.shelf=== "read") .map(book=>{ return(
    2. )}) }
{/* move to search page */}
) } export default Shelves
